data.name: Tip_ContentLocalize.Text
data.value:
Classified Pro module supports content localization, here you can specify department properties (name, Cp_Product_List sub module page, Cp_Product_Detail sub module page, extra specifications) for different languages. Select a target language first, modify related data and click "Update" to save.

For example, if a department name is "Software" in English (en-US), you can enter "软件" as its Chinese name, then when display in a "Chinese (zh-CN)" culture page, the department name will be shown as "软件".

data.name: Tip_DetailPage.Text
data.value:
Select when user visit website with current language (current culture code), and click a product which belongs to current department, which page will dispaly product detail. You can configure this page as follows:
1. Create a page (or select a existing), make sure its "Localization - Culture Type" property is current language.
2. Put a Cp_Product_Detail sub module instance on the page.
3. Click "Product detail settings" of Cp_Product_Detail sub module, select its "Department" property to current department.

Module will try to automatic fill this value when you put Cp_Product_Detail sub module instance on certain page. Note, this setting is vital to integrate with DNN built-in search mechanism. If you can't search products for current language in DNN built-in search box, please check this setting.

data.name: Tip_ExtendField.Text
data.value:
Specifications are detail description of products which belong to this department. Module already has a built-in fields - "Detail" for all departments.

Besides that, module also supports up to 5 additional specification fields which you can customize. You can enable them and specify their title and default value. If you enable some of them for current department, you can specify their localized content (title, default value) here.

data.name: Tip_ListPage.Text
data.value:
Select when user visit website with current language (current culture code), and search product or click product category, which page will dispaly products which belong to current department.You can configure this page as follows:
1. Create a page (or select a existing), make sure its "Localization - Culture Type" property is current language.
2. Put a Cp_Product_List sub module instance on the page.
3. Click "Product list settings" of Cp_Product_List sub module, select its "Department" property to current department.

Note, module will try to automatic fill this value when you put Cp_Product_List sub module instance on certain page.

data.name: Tip_VendorProfilePage.Text
data.value:
Select when user visit website with current language (current culture code), and click vendor item at Cp_Product_Vendor sub module, which page will dispaly vendor profiel and his products which belong to current department.You can configure this page as follows:
1. Create a page (or select a existing), make sure its "Localization - Culture Type" property is current language.
2. Put a Cp_Product_VendorProfile sub module instance on the page.
3. Click "Vendor Profile Settings" of Cp_Product_VendorProfile sub module, select its "Department" property to current department.

Note, module will try to automatic fill this value when you put Cp_Product_VendorProfile sub module instance on certain page.
